label: User Choice/Control
description: Practice that describes general choices and control options available to users.
usage:
Apply when the policy describes general user control mechanisms and privacy choices available to users, regardless of specific data practices.

Key attributes to consider:
- Choice Type (required): What control options exist - opt-in, opt-out links, privacy controls, browser settings, etc.
- Choice Scope (required): What the choices apply to - first party collection/use, third party sharing/use
- Personal Information Type (required): What data the choices apply to
- Purpose (required): What purposes the choices cover
- User Type (optional): Whether choices apply to users with/without accounts
